messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] NPR Diane Rehm show 6/20/00 - Homeschool ing!
messages.msgSnippet: NPR is broadcasted on the internet. ... From: Tracy Oldfield [mailto:tracy.oldfield@ntlworld.com] Sent: Saturday, June 17, 2000 11:29 AM To:
messages.messageBody:
NPR is broadcasted on the internet.

-----Original Message-----
From: Tracy Oldfield [mailto:tracy.oldfield@...]
Sent: Saturday, June 17, 2000 11:29 AM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] NPR Diane Rehm show 6/20/00 -
Homeschooling!


Is this going to get online at all? Cos I wouldn't be able to receive
any of the radio stations any other way <g>

Tracy
PS, I hope so, I love to put voices to names <g>

On 17 Jun 2000, at 7:41, Billy or Nancy wrote:

The Diane Rehm Show, produced in Washington, DC and
syndicated by National
Public Radio to about 65 NPR stations around the
country, will air a
one-hour live segment on home schooling with listener
call ins on Tuesday,
June 20, 10am - 11am EST.
